Moving from left to right:

The curve begins at point (0 comma 0).

The curve trends up gradually to reach its maximum point at (1 comma 1).

At point (1 comma 1), the curve trends down gradually, through the x-axis at point (2 comma 0) and reaches its minimum point at (3 comma negative 1).

At point (3 comma negative 1), the curve trends up gradually to the right and ends at point (4 comma 0).
